qrCode.rataUnica: Scan the QR Code with your payment app or use the data printed here.
qrCode.rate: Scan the QR Code with your payment app or use the data printed above.

descrizione.noEnte: Go to pagopa.gov.it and choose your preferred channel.
descrizione.sitoEnte: Go to pagopa.gov.it and choose your preferred channel, or visit [Ente.Nome] website.

territorio.descrizione: at banks and ATMs, in post offices, cafés, news stands, betting and tobacco Shops, supermarkets and other affiliated merchants in Italy.

descrizione.noEnte: with the IO app, from your Home Banking, with your payment app or with other enabled channels.
descrizione.sitoEnte: with the IO app, on the {{EnteNome}} website, from your Home Banking, with your payment app or with other enabled channels.

territorio.descrizione: at banks and ATMs, in post offices, cafés, news stands, betting and tobacco Shops, supermarkets and other affiliated merchants.

descrizione.noEnte: or with your Home Banking, payment app or the other affiliated channels.
descrizione.sitoEnte: or with [Ente.Nome] website, your Home Banking, payment app or the other affiliated channels.

giacenza.descrizione: The notification is the day of the collection, if this occurs within 10 days from the date printed on the non-delivery notice. If you don’t collect the notice within 10 days, count the deadlines starting from the 11th day.
giacenza.titolo: What happens in case of a failed delivery attempt?

disclaimer.legal: During the payment, if allowed by the payee, the amount may be updated automatically and be subject to decereases (in case of discounts or credit notes) or increases (in case of penalties, interest, etc.).

rate.molteRate: Amounts and due dates are shown in each instalment detail.
rate.rate: You can pay in full or in [avviso.rate.totali] instalments.

scadenze.descrizione: The day of notification is not counted. If the due date is a Sunday (or a public holiday), you can also pay on the next working day.

disclaimer.scelta: Choose the correct amount depending on deadlines, otherwise you will receive other payment requests for the remaining and/or additional amounts.

scadenza.sessantaGiorni: From the 6th to the 60th day from the notification

importoScadenza.titolo: How much and when to pay?
